name: Silent Filter
description:
A story based game about media restriction. You are an employee of Silent Filter, the organization of THE STATE works  for consider and censor medias. Your duty is to ban all negative content about THE STATE before the media is published. Everything you do will affect the citizen of THE STATE and yourself. Will you risk your life reveal all the truth or work strictly for THE STATE.
